## READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 431, 719, 446]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 446, 325, 460]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 460, 504, 475]]<|/det|>
You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 475, 504, 490]]<|/det|>
Do not use staples, paper clips, glue or correction fluid.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 489, 380, 504]]<|/det|>
DO NOT WRITE IN ANY BARCODES.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 515, 255, 530]]<|/det|>
Answer all questions.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 653, 545]]<|/det|>
If working is needed for any question it must be shown below that question.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 545, 380, 559]]<|/det|>
Electronic calculators should be used.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 559, 905, 589]]<|/det|>
If the degree of accuracy is not specified in the question, and if the answer is not exact, give the answer to three significant figures. Give answers in degrees to one decimal place.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 588, 448, 602]]<|/det|>
For \(\pi\) , use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 613, 604, 628]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 628, 757, 643]]<|/det|>

She can buy

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[230, 241, 529, 259]]<|/det|>
• 7 apples and 4 bananas for 85 cents

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 259, 215, 274]]<|/det|>
or

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[230, 272, 534, 290]]<|/det|>
• 3 apples and 8 bananas for 93 cents.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 304, 571, 321]]<|/det|>
Apples cost \(a\) cents each and bananas cost \(b\) cents each.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 335, 181, 352]]<|/det|>
<label>(i)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 335, 635, 352]]<|/det|>
This information can be used to write down two equations.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 350, 421, 368]]<|/det|>
One of these is \(7a + 4b = 85.\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 381, 428, 398]]<|/det|>
Write down the other equation.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[651, 427, 920, 445]]<|/det|>
<form>.................................. = ................ [2]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[149, 458, 181, 476]]<|/det|>
<label>(ii)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 458, 499, 475]]<|/det|>
Solve these two simultaneous equations.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 473, 445, 491]]<|/det|>
You must show all your working.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[616, 740, 890, 757]]<|/det|>
<form>\(a =\) ................................................

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[616, 771, 920, 789]]<|/det|>
<form>\(b =\) ................................................
